name: Rapid Grappler

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 13, Greater Grapple, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 9th.

sections.body: Whenever you use Greater Grapple to successfully maintain a grapple as a move action, you can then spend a swift action to make a grapple combat maneuver check.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You are a quick hand at grappling.
